title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.

Health and fitness trackers is higher than any other categories with value 39.0, followed by Wrist sport computers, and Action cameras headsets and glasses. Down to category Smart watches with the lowest value of 11.0.
The highest value at Health and fitness trackers is almost 3.55 times larger than the minimum value of Smart watches.

The difference between the max Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and min Wearable technology products Smart watches is 28.0.
